definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="168" y="100"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="projectile_shoot_from_entity"><value name="entity"><block type="immediate_source_entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="explode"><field name="mode">NONE</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="power"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_remove_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:FireClashCapsuleProjectile</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="immediate_source_entity_from_deps"/></value></block></next></block></next><value name="projectile"><block type="projectiles_arrow"><field name="projectile">CUSTOM:FireClashCapsuleProjectile</field><field name="fire">FALSE</field><field name="particles">FALSE</field><field name="pickup">DISALLOWED</field><value name="damage"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><value name="knockback"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><value name="piercing"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="shooter"><block type="immediate_source_entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="inaccuracy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
